backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with cruise deals, itineraries, bookings, reviews, user profiles, share links, branding settings, and admin alerts with storage and authorization mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components and files.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React app and preloading the hero image.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that switches between shared itinerary view and the full app UI based on share link detection.
Shows toast notifications to admins for new unviewed booking alerts.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog with tabs for alerts, bookings, logo management, and branding settings.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin settings dialog for viewing user role, assigning admin privileges, and showing app status and live link.
frontend/src/components/AppStatusLiveLin: Displays the app's live URL with copy/open actions and shows backend diagnostics including version and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Provides a booking dialog allowing users to select cabins, calculate total cost, and submit a trip booking.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Renders a cruise deal card with images, details, favorites handling, and itinerary popup support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, update, preview, and delete cruise line logos with image upload validation.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Displays a grid of cruise line partner logos with loading skeletons and fallback messaging.
Shows a dialog listing the user's favorite cruise deals or a message when none are saved.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto-scrolling carousel with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, login/logout handling, and access to user and admin dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with a background image, error fallback, headline text, and action buttons.
Shows detailed cruise itinerary information with tabs, reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF export features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and saves their profile.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Manages displaying, submitting, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with star ratings.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Provides a cruise search UI with debounced text input, filter controls, and results from query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a public itinerary page using shareable link data and branding settings, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Renders a settings panel to edit and reset branding fields, syncing with backend settings.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a dialog listing the user's bookings with status, dates, and linked itinerary info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity changes, invalidating related queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a hook returning a debounced version of a given value.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise-related data, with helpers to normalize and key search filters.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes including ocean and sunset color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Validates CSS color strings and offers helpers to safely apply colors or fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable PDF-like HTML view for an itinerary by opening a new window with styled content.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Provides default branding values and a helper to merge backend branding settings with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including custom color variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and pending feature requests focused on adding, processing, and displaying a hero image with proper fallback and preload behavior.
